Headline: #22 Clark Temporary Reroute at Racine/Belmont
ShortDescription: 22 Clark buses are temporarily rerouted in via Clark, Racine, Belmont and Clark: due to, street blockage near Racine/Belmont.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#22 Clark buses are temporarily rerouted in via Clark, Racine, Belmont and Clark: due to, street blockage near Racine/Belmont.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Brown Line Delays
ShortDescription: Brown Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier report of a minor fire at track level near Belmont. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Brown Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier report of a minor fire at track level near Belmont.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Red Line Delays
ShortDescription: Howard-bound Red Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier report of  a minor fire at track level near Belmont. Allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Howard-bound Red Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier report of  a minor fire at track level near Belmont.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
